column4: I upgrade Ubuntu after it spams me for a month. What do I have to show for it? CERTAINLY NO SHADER SUPPORT. God, why haven't I learned my lessons after the last three Ubuntu """"upgrades""""
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
